display_long_description:
**🌍 SAVE OUR ORBIT – Together, let’s clean the skies.**

The future of Earth’s orbit is in our hands. For decades, satellites and rockets have left debris circling above our planet. Now it’s up to us—the scrappers, salvagers, and pioneers—to clean up the mess, piece by piece. 

**🚀 Built Together with the Community**

Save Our Orbit is being developed in stages, and we need you on board from the very beginning. Each update will expand the game with new features, systems, and mechanics, but the direction will be shaped by your feedback. You’re not just playing—you’re helping us decide the future of this project.

**♻️ The Core Idea**

Every piece of junk in orbit matters. You’ll pilot your ship, chase down derelict satellites, and choose:

- Just scrap it for quick profit
- Salvage valuable parts for rare components!

All your efforts will feed into a global salvage counter, showing the progress of the entire player community. 

**🛠️ The Current Release – Update 0.2**

This first release focuses on ship movement testing.

Earth is 1:1 scale, so distances feel real.

Use the joystick on the right side and the trigger to apply thrust. It may take time to master, but once you do, you’ll discover how cool it is!

We need your feedback: does it feel good? Too heavy, too light? Help us tune it!

📅 What’s Next

- Expanding ship systems and interiors.
- Collecting debris in orbit.
- Selling salvage at orbital stations.

🌌 This is just the beginning. Jump in now, help shape the future, and let’s Save Our Orbit—together.
